QuestData.Title: Dragon, Unchained
QuestData.Description: Lirastrasza is the last and greatest of the red dragons that the Twilight's Hammer captured. They're about to kill her.$B$BI need you to take the Elementium Axe and free her from her bonds.
QuestData.PortraitGiverText: Use the Elementium Axe to unchain her!
QuestData.LogDescription: Use the Elementium Axe to break the chains enslaving Lirastrasza.
QuestData.CompletionText: Use the axe to break Lirastrasza's chains.
QuestData.RewardText: Isn't she a beauty?$B$BLet's see what she does now that she's free.
